about_the_game:
Santa's Amazing Christmas Wonderland Adventure!

Enjoy Happy Holidays in Springfield. Help Santa in his Brand New house & North Pole Workshops. Fly in his New Sleigh. Visit Santa's Amazing 'Frozen World' Grotto. Enjoy a sensational Celebrity Banquet. Spend Christmas at Liberty Valley Winter Resort!

Decorate the Your Own Christmas Wonderland House. Win fabulous Rewards & Achievements. Search for Frosty the Snowman. Take photos, make an Album.

The Toys are made and it's Christmas Eve! Rudolph & team are hitched to the Sleigh. Santa flies around the World while Kids are asleep, or are they? ... soon it's another wonderful Christmas Morning.

Help Santa find Hidden Objects, Lost Presents, Gold Angels. Play superb Mini-Games. Earn Merit Badges.

Christmas Wonderland 15 is crammed full of Presents & Hidden Surprises with Gorgeous Graphics and Puzzles. Play in 3 modes (Casual, Challenge, Extreme - collect ALL against the clock) Join in the fun, with Captivating Christmas gameplay for Families and Friends of All Ages & Abilities to enjoy.

  • Go to Liberty Valley Winter Resort.

  • Enjoy a Sensational Xmas Banquet.

  • Help Make Charity Care Packs.

  • 3 Modes, Casual, Challenge, Extreme!

  • Special Extreme Mode Rewards.

  • Bonus Locations, Graphics & Gameplay.

  • Mega Collection of Bonus Puzzles.

  • Unique Wallpapers & Music Player.
